versos: (shittim) "And they shall make an ark of shittim wood..." - Exodus 25:10 KJV;;;
(incense) Exodus 30:7 - "Aaron must burn fragrant incense on the altar every morning when he tends the lamps.";;;
(ephod) Exodus 28:6 - "They are to make the ephod of gold, and of blue, purple and scarlet yarn, and of finely twisted linen.";;;

(rings) Exodus 35:22 "All who were willing, men and women alike, came and brought gold jewelry of all kinds: brooches, earrings, rings and ornaments. They all presented their gold as a wave offering to the Lord.";;;
(corners) Isaiah 28:16 - "See, I lay a stone in Zion, a tested stone, a precious cornerstone for a sure foundation; the one who relies on it will never be stricken with panic.";;;
(staves) Exodus 7:12 - For they cast down every man his rod
(balak) Numbers 22:2 - "Now balak son of Zippor saw all that Israel had done to the Amorites,";;;
(zippor) Numbers 22:21 - Balaam got up in the morning

(stroke) 2 Kings 4:41 - "Elisha said, 'Give it to the people to eat.' And his attendant said, 'What, shall I set this before a hundred men' But he said, 'Give them to the people to eat, for thus says the Lord, "They shall eat and have some left over."'";;;
(borne) Isaiah 53:4 - "Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows: yet we did esteem him stricken, smitten of God, and afflicted.";;;

(seat) Exodus 17:12 - "When Moses hands grew tired, they took a stone and put it under him and he sat on it. Aaron and Hur held his hands upone on one side, one on the otherso that his hands remained steady till sunset.";;;
(ends) Hebrews 3:14 - "For we have come to share in Christ, if indeed we hold our original conviction firmly to the very end.";;;
(cherub) Ezekiel 10:15 - "And the cherubim were lifted up. This is the living creature that I saw by the Kebar River.";;;
(bowls) Revelation 16:1 - "Then I heard a loud voice from the temple saying to the seven angels, 'Go, pour out the seven bowls of Gods wrath on the earth.'";;;
(withal) "And withal they learn to be idle, wandering about from house to house; and not only idle, but tattlers also and busybodies, speaking things which they ought not." - 1 Timothy 5:13 KJV;;;
